com.kamontat.rawapi

Interface Downloadable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Callable<String>

    public interface Downloadable
extends Callable<String>
    get more information or download file
    Implemented at DownloadFactory
    Since:
    Mon 20/Mar/2017 - 10:38 PM
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    kamontat

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String call()
      same thing with download(Runnable) method and using getDefaultAction(URLReader) as parameter as well.
      String download(Runnable action)
      try to download something (this is long long method)
      You might need to execute in in background
      The action you can use method in getDefaultAction(URLReader) (already implemented in DownloadFactory)
      String getContentType()
      get get of download file (learn more at ContentType)
      static Runnable getDefaultAction(URLReader r)
      just print reader byte, can use in download(Runnable) method
      String getName()
      get name of download file
      URLReader getReader()
      get reader, you can get only the download(Runnable) is called
      long getSize()
      get download size

    • Method Detail

      • getReader

        @Nullable
URLReader getReader()
        get reader, you can get only the download(Runnable) is called
        Returns:
        URLReader for reading data, or null if error occurred

      • download

        String download(@Nullable
                Runnable action)
         throws UpdateException,
                IOException
        try to download something (this is long long method)
        You might need to execute in in background
        The action you can use method in getDefaultAction(URLReader) (already implemented in DownloadFactory)
        Parameters:
        action - action while downloading, or null if you don't want to do anything
        Returns:
        result location
        Throws:
        UpdateException - Error occurred when try to download
        IOException

      • getSize

        long getSize()
        get download size
        Returns:
        size in Byte (you can convert in SizeUtil)

      • getContentType

        String getContentType()
        get get of download file (learn more at ContentType)
        Returns:
        get in String format

      • getName

        String getName()
        get name of download file
        Returns:
        String file name

      • call

        default String call()
             throws Exception
        same thing with download(Runnable) method and using getDefaultAction(URLReader) as parameter as well.

        Shouldn't override more

        Specified by:
        call in interface Callable<String>
        Returns:
        result location
        Throws:
        Exception - when error occurred

      • getDefaultAction

        static Runnable getDefaultAction(URLReader r)
        just print reader byte, can use in download(Runnable) method
        Parameters:
        r - reader URLReader
        Returns:
        runnable
